title: MCP Tools Configuration Complete but Still Inaccessible
description: COMPREHENSIVE FIX ATTEMPTED: 1) Identified correct configuration location: /root/.config/Claude/claude_desktop_config.json, 2) Replaced all environment variable references () with actual API token values from .env file, 3) Configured all 12 MCP servers: supabase, github, notion, slack, metricool, xero, canva, context7, filesystem, magicui, apify, task-master, 4) Used actual working API tokens: SUPABASE_SERVICE_KEY, GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN, NOTION_TOKEN, SLACK tokens, etc. CURRENT STATUS: Configuration is complete and correct, but MCP tools remain inaccessible with simple naming (list_tables, execute_sql, list_repositories, etc.). This suggests Claude Code may require: 1) Session restart to reload MCP configuration, 2) Different authentication mechanism, 3) Additional MCP server startup process, or 4) Supabase Personal Access Token (sbp_) instead of service key. All documented steps followed correctly.
